attributes.action: Withold all MP’s salaries and expenses until the BREXIT fiasco is resolved.
attributes.additional_details: Cancel article 50 and stay in, agree to May’s proposed deal and leave, leave with no deal, and every other possible option all have pros and cons but the simple truth is no one knows what’s best because no country has gone through anything similar and the future is always uncertain. So someone needs to make a decision and people elected and paid to do so are our MPs. Voting against proposals is not sufficient. Any petulant child can do that. If they want their pay the must vote for something!
attributes.background: MPs are completely insulated from damage that the prolonged and unnecessary uncertainty is inflicting on the rest of the nation. They are elected to govern. Governing requires decisions. They should not be paid until they do what they are paid to do. End the uncertainty now!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
